fields.headline: Chereau leads Cannes jury 2003
fields.bodyText: Patrice Chereau, director of La Reine Margot among other hit French films, is to preside over the competition jury at this year's Cannes film festival. "His work has always been accompanied by a reflection of the nature of art," said Gilles Jacob, Cannes president. "He has often gone out on a limb in order to satisfy this curiosity, which he has pursed in the linked fields of theatre, opera and now cinema."
